description: Grant funding agreements and contracts issued to providers, which are extensions of the 2019 to 2020 agreements and contracts.

attachments.title: Education and training 2014 to 2017 contract for services extension
Higher education institutions adult contract for services: higher level apprenticeships
Contract for services: adult education budget (procured)

details.body:
This page contains funding agreements and contracts for 2020 to 2021. For agreements and contracts relating to other years, see the ESFA funding agreements and contracts collection page.

Details

The contract sets out:

  • the obligations of the education and training provider in return for receiving public funding from the department
  • the circumstances in which the department will take intervention action in the event of educational, financial or other failure of the provider

Higher education institutions adult contract for services: higher level apprenticeships
